casebody.data:
Nicole SIMONE
v.
CITY OF BATON ROUGE, Marvin D. Frazier, State Lumber and Supply Company, Inc., and the State of Louisiana Through the Department of Transportation Marvin D. Frazier
v.
Nicole Simone, State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Company, City of Baton Rouge, State of Louisiana, Through the Department of Transportation and Development, and Pennsylvania & Indiana Lumbermens Mutual Insurance Company NO. 2019-CC-0037 Supreme Court of Louisiana. February 25, 2019

Denied.
